title: 2017 Border Rewards
body: Today, when you play a normal game or an aram game, the border around your character in the loading screen shows the elo you were at the end of last season in ranked. In this season however, there are 2 types of ranked games (solo/duo and flex). My question is: after the end of the 2017 season, when you play normals or aram, which border will appear around your character? (from solo/duo or from flex?)

replies.body:
We updated the [Preseason FAQ ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231832207-Preseason-FAQ)to give details on border visual based on your queue.  There are a lot of queues involved, but here are the ones specific to your question:

Ranked Solo/Duo - 2016 Dynamic Queue
Ranked Flex 5v5 - Best of 2016 Dynamic Queue or Ranked 5s (not available until Patch 6.23)
Ranked Flex 3v3 - 2016 Ranked 3s (not available until Patch 6.23)
Normal Summoner's Rift - Best of 2016 Dynamic Queue or Ranked 5s
Normal Twisted Treeline - Best of 2016 Dynamic Queue or Ranked 3s

Hope that helps!

Two corrections.
1. Iirc, in previous seasons, borders have been based on your highest rank out of the three ranked queues. Gold 3s, Silver Solo, and Bronze 5s would display a Gold border in general. However, queuing for a ranked queue would display the specific border for that queue (e.g. Silver border in Solo queue in that previous example).
2. There's three types of ranked games this season:  SR Solo/Duo, SR Flex,, and TT Flex.

As to your question, Riot probably hasn't decided on how ranked rewards will work yet. Borders will probably continue to be based on highest rank in any queue, but it's not definite.
